title: Milady Poem
body:
There was a really bad month where Tomaszo stayed up late after his wife went to bed every night. He would listen to podcasts and play a skateboarding video game. He often used a cell phone application called Twitter to view and recommend to others a diverse array of ironic, cynical, sarcastically violent, earnestly violent, and/or politically extreme media that leveraged characters and stylistic themes/imagery from Japanese animation, low-resolution still shots and promotional material from outdated computer games, and assorted iconography, turns of phrase, and/or images appropriated from disparate internet communities of which he was sometimes a member and sometimes an outsider. But he also used the cell phone application to communicate his earnest thoughts and feelings so that people on the internet could console him in his paranoid schizophrenia or talk him down during bad episodes of autism.

He tweeted about how he felt this strange detachment and someone sent him a Twitter dm saying he was probably having a dissociative episode and that even though it happens to people sometimes, he shouldnâ€™t tweet about it, because of how employers and family and whoever else can see his tweets and might do something that would make his life worse, like send him to a psychiatric hospital or prevent him from getting a different job. He thanked the person, deleted the tweet, and read most of the â€œdissociative disorderâ€ article on Wikipedia.

He unpaused the skateboarding game. He dissociated some more. He had a hard time playing the game but liked having a word for what was happening. He paused the game. He looked at Twitter. He saw a brand entity icon account, @milady, post a joke about video games. Tomaszo replied to the @Milady account with a funny joke death threat. The @milady account was verified on Twitter. Tomaszo looked up how to be verified on Twitter. The verification process required a photo identification and filling out bureaucratic-seeming forms; it didnâ€™t seem to make any sense for a brand to be verified on Twitter. Tomaszo deleted his death threat because he knew it was low-value, violent speech that wasnâ€™t protectable under the First Amendment. Tomaszo then tweeted at the @milady account to ask if it had photo identification. The @milady account quote-tweeted Tomaszoâ€™s tweet alongside a photo of a man being stabbed in the neck. The picture seemed real and was exceptionally graphic. There was blood and the beginnings of a gaping wound. The @milady account called Tomaszo a dumb piece of shit in the quote-tweet. Tomaszo liked the threatening and violent tweet out of a vague hope that it would defuse things. He unpaused his skateboarding game and worriedly played for seventeen minutes.

He paused the game and checked Twitter and saw that the @milady accountâ€™s quote-tweet had been deleted. The @milady account had tweeted an apology about being hacked. The apology had several thousand likes. Tomaszo received a dm from the @milady account. The @milady account called him a *little bitch.* The @milady account sent another dm calling him a *fucking narc*. The @milady account sent another dm with a picture of the man being stabbed in the neck. It looked like the same man from the first photo being stabbed for a second time. Tomaszo saw both neck wounds full of shiny blood. He saw that the @milady account was typing another dm.

He closed the Twitter application and put down his phone. He looked at the TV. He picked up his phone and opened the Twitter application. He saw that the @milady account had sent another dm. He looked at the message preview and thought, â€œthis seems really bad,â€ and laughed uncomfortably, waking his wife.

title: The Philosophical Story of a Japanese Landlady
body:
When we were in Japan, we lived in the house of the eldest son of the landlord and shared a yard with the old landlord. When the two children were young, they watched the children for me, the old lady worked in the fields, and I often took the children to help. I deal with the elderly every day, and have established a very close relationship between day and night. I am fortunate to have learned important life lessons from the elderly while living happily.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/uNCYYhvelt3Jvq4eJHXTH.png?height=270&width=415)

Always fill the bowl and return it

The old landlord, the old man, broke down two years ago, and now he lives in a nursing home. The old lady is the only one left at home. Thinking that it is inconvenient for the old man to be alone, I have to give a bowl of delicious food to the old lady. The old lady always accepted it happily. Two days later, she came to the door and returned the bowl to thank it. The bowl was always full. Sometimes it's the blueberries she harvests, sometimes it's chocolate for the kids, sometimes it's two snacks, but she never returns an empty bowl. The old lady never talked about her philosophy of life, but she told me with her actions: it is not enough to accept the benefits of others, and it is not enough to say thanks with your mouth, you must return it in kind, even if it is a small thing that is not valuabl

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7laxPH1vEuvkw_r26bsE3.png?height=273&width=409)

e.

Today's affairs will never be postponed until tomorrow

Ever since I met the old lady landlord, I thought she was very busy. As many people come to her every day, there are as many things to do, so whenever something in the house breaks and needs to be repaired, I am embarrassed. But as long as I mustered up the courage to speak, the old lady immediately put down what she was doing, and immediately contacted me to fix it. No matter how troublesome, no matter how much it costs, the old lady never procrastinates. Maybe she knew that feeling distressed for the current little money, or putting the problem aside for a while, would only make things worse. Unpleasant things have to be resolved immediately, the longer the delay, the harder it is to do.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IMYRuL07jaMTvESzIWJJG.png?height=270&width=417)

Live and learnIn Japanese Shinto, the green leaves of the camellia family are used for decoration. The old couple planted a lot of these trees back then, and the leaves sold better than the flowers. Although this kind of business has long been discontinued, some shrines still like to ask for his family due to the good reputation they have accumulated in the past. The old lady took the call from the shrine and went to the mountain to chop branches, and then brought them back with a small truck to trim them in her garage. The old lady felt that it was a waste of time to do this work for several hours. So, she bought a CD that reads Japanese classical literature aloud and listened to it while pruning branches. Our whole family was shocked when the soft female voice echoed in the garage for the first time. The old lady who graduated from junior high school has been doing farm work all her life, and has been a big landowner for most of her life. She has a million-dollar family property. Nearly 80 years old, she is still doing farm work in the garage while listening to classical literature recitations. Continuing to learn will not make her richer, but it will make her more spiritual.

title: I am a little goldfish
body:
I am a little goldfish. If you really want to know how small it is, it may only be five centimeters with a ruler. I don't know where I came from, let alone what my mother looked like. For as long as I can remember, I have lived in a transparent glass tank with goldfish of various sizes and colors. The man who has passed the age of confusion sprinkles some fine powdery things into the fish tank every day. We all know that it is food. This is not because our noses are sensitive enough, but experience and habits tell us. We, in addition to eating, will never have any other surprises. At this moment, my companions and I opened our mouths and swam towards the food with lightning speed. Everyone has to go all out to try to eat more, because if we didn't eat today, we have to wait until tomorrow, which is too long for our stomachs. I don't know who spread the public opinion that goldfish can only be eaten once a day, and only a small amount, otherwise it will die. Alas, no communication is really scary. These grotesque antics always starve us, so we scrambled for less than 10 seconds. It is said that human beings cannot afford to hurt because of money, then our goldfish destroys harmony because of food.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/c6ATycOZw_E421crU1QH0.png?height=266&width=435)

We had a leisurely life, but we had no bigger places to go, and I often longed for vast freedoms. If possible, I would like to fight for freedom. The funny thing is that although we are weak, we cannot find a strong enemy.

Every day when I see pedestrians hurried by, I have such a show of self-comfort in my heart: Although I don't have the freedom of your human beings, I have free food to eat, don't worry about where to live. At this time, I can finally find a sense of superiority in being a goldfish. Of course, if anyone disdains my sense of superiority, it means that you haven't realized the difficulty of this accommodation. Go and watch the BBC documentary, after watching it, you will know how difficult it is to have a meal these days, and how difficult it is to have a nest.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wpiEjr1rfcAncfNIV5eaL.png?height=266&width=450)

I look happy every day, but I also have my own sadness. Every time I see my companions who have lived and played together leave, no one can see the sadness in my eyes, at least I know that humans are invisible, because they all leave with undisguised joy. But slowly I also accepted this separation, the old companion left, the new companion came, and so on. To be honest, when those goldfish were taken away one by one, in addition to being sad, I also flashed some despicable joy, but fortunately I ran fast and was not caught.

The days are just like this, when I eat comfortably and swim freely every day, it slips away quietly. One day when I was wandering around, I suddenly found that there were fewer and fewer goldfishes I was familiar with, and I realized that I had been in this fish tank for more than half a year. I suddenly wondered what life was going on for the goldfish that was taken away? And why did you stay here for so long? Is it a lucky escape every time, or are those people who don't want to take me away because I'm not pretty? I always thought it was the former. OMG! Am I not pretty? I never thought about this question. I immediately turned around a few times, and the surroundings were transparent, so I couldn't see myself. If it's really because I'm ugly that I've been kept here forever, then the joy of every escape before has become the biggest irony now.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9ylFc5S7PL5blZwZEFTGH.png?height=279&width=448)

When someone came to pick goldfish again, I swam hard and jumped up happily. Once I was finally lucky enough to be caught, only to be brushed down mercilessly, and I was embarrassed at the time. After being eliminated again and again, I realized that I am an ornamental goldfish. My value is that humans bring me home, and when they see me, they are pleasant to the eyes and in a good mood. I hate myself for not thinking about this before.

It seems that my appearance has no advantage, and I am trapped in a pile of fish. Everyone has their own characteristics. How can I leave this place and reflect my value? I realized I couldn't stay here for comfort anymore, because no one would ever appreciate me here. To think of new places to go, I have to put in more effort than any other goldfish.

To say that in the past, I was swimming lazily, but now I am swimming happily. I want to find my strengths, I don't have a good appearance, but I want to have a healthy body. Slowly I found myself with a new skill, and that is when I hold my head up and blow bubbles with my head up, my mouth can make a loud noise, I think the strings of bubbles are matched with This voice should make me look spirited and cute. This is something that other goldfish can't do, and I snickered. Waiting quietly for the arrival of the new owner.

But a few days later, I'm still here.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hqPccJ0VqSIi9NmPpW583.png?height=279&width=448)

At this moment, a mother and a five-year-old boy came to the fish tank. The mother lets her child choose their favorite goldfish. I looked at this little boy: white skin, smooth and full forehead, big eyes focused and focused, the yellow shirt and blue plaid shorts made him more beautiful and cute. I fell in love with him right away and swam to the front without hesitation. The little boy looked left and right, not knowing which one to choose. I knew it was time to give full play to my special talents. Sure enough, the little boy picked me up decisively after seeing my performance. Maybe he was too excited. When I was just picked up, his hand shook and I was thrown to the ground mercilessly. After I got out of the water and fell, I couldn't breathe like I had asthma, and I was dying on the ground. Fortunately, the little boy picked me up immediately and put me in the water bag that the man had already prepared. I took a deep breath, and I never thought the water tasted so good. At this time, the child's mother said: "No, I just fell to the ground, and I'm sure it won't last long. Let's pick another one!" The little boy said: No, I want this one, who said it wouldn't live long, look how well it swims! You can blow bubbles when you fall on the ground!

title: Ability to manage emotions
body:
There is such a young man who is irritable by nature and has difficulty controlling his emotions. His old father asked his son that if he could not control his emotions in the future, he would fix a nail on the wall in the backyard and wait for his emotions to stabilize. Pull the nail out again. So the young man followed his father's instructions. At first, he even set 30 nails a day, but every time the young man pulled out the nails, he deeply felt that the process of pulling out the nails required more effort than the act of setting the nails. Several times, so, the guy slowly began to reduce the chance of nailing, gradually, from 30 nails per day to 15, until he stopped going to the backyard to set nails for several days. Later, the old father brought the young man to the backyard and pointed to the wall board that was full of savage people. When he was out of control, the words he said were like putting nails in the heart. Even if the nails were pulled out, the scars would still be hard to recover.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QskrKJK5WtLCJvdzFJSq6.png?height=282&width=453)

I vaguely remember that the story was described in this way. It is fortunate that the young man has such a wise old father, who can use such a vivid method to let his son realize the true meaning of it. Thankfully again, I saw a story that made me and the guy in the story feel the importance of emotional management. If you are angry for one minute, you will lose 60 seconds of your happy life; what you say and do when you lose your mind will make you regret immediately; a high education is a threshold for you to enter the workplace, but high emotional intelligence can help you do well in the workplace . And so on similar words are all telling us that emotional management it is important.

Your ability to manage emotions is actually the quotient of your emotional management, commonly known as emotional intelligence. Expert research has pointed out that the difference between EQ and IQ is that a large part of IQ comes from heredity, and there is little chance of acquired change, but EQ can be improved through the guidance and efforts of others, so there is so much management. Learn from experts to study emotion management, and there are so many people who are looking forward to success in emotion management who donâ€™t hesitate to take a related course.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Lkeq7n9p26iXtmy6iJw48.png?height=270&width=412)

So based on the improvement of my emotional management ability, I have consulted quite a few books, and now I will share with you what I have gained.

Enter the word "emotion" into Baidu, and there is such an explanation "it is a reaction to the environment". Faced with the same environment, such as a rainy day, different people will have different emotional experiences: those who meet to go out to play will feel disappointed, and farmers who are worried that the drought will affect their harvest will feel lucky. The key to different reactions is that people are different, so emotions are actually just a subjective reaction of people to the internal and external environment. Many times, the uncomfortable physiological reactions that emotions bring to us and the adverse consequences of their actions will make us feel that some emotions are bad. Yes, it is not. Emotions are neither good or bad, but a subjective reaction of us.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ogTUAbxRVOhUE-8K8spy7.png?height=276&width=442)

By analogy, it is not difficult to see from the definition of emotional management "the management of your own reactions to the environment" that the key to good emotional management lies in yourself, because it is a management of your own reactions, so It is said that you have 100% control over emotional management, and it depends on you, not on others. Many times, we often hear someone complaining after losing control of their emotions, "If it wasn't for his attitude, I wouldn't have such impulsive actions." In fact, this sentence is just to find a reason for our loss of control. The remote control of management has always been in our own hands. Once you have a request for the response of the other party, you will unconditionally hand over the remote control of your emotions to the other party, so it is inevitable to lose control.

The colorful colors are derived from the three primary colors of red, green and blue. Although there are hundreds of expressions of emotions, they can be summarized into four basic emotions: joy, anger, sorrow, and fear.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cb94OE6aGjZbFDKfMh7v1.png?height=289&width=303)

Joy and sadness are a pair of opposite emotions. When people achieve their desired goals and relieve tension and anxiety, the feeling of comfort is the emotional experience of joy; sadness is the emotional experience after the loss of the desired goal. Anger and fear are another pair of opposing emotions; usually when a person encounters an unpleasant thing, our autonomic nervous system will produce a flight or fight response, and when the opponent we encounter is stronger than us, we will take flight. , which is the emotional experience of fear; and when the other party is weaker than us, we will have war, which is the emotional experience of anger. Taking cats and mice as an example, an adult cat has 500 experience points for catching mice, and a weak mouse has 50 experience points against cats, so such a cat will immediately take an offensive stance; another cat has 100 experience points to fight against a cat. The mouse experience value is 150, then the cat may choose to avoid it; there is another cat with 300 experience value, and the mouse experience value of the battle is 250, then we will see the cat keep slapping the mouse with its paws , keep slapping until the mouse escapes without panting before attacking and winning. In our opinion, the third cat is playing with the mouse. If the third cat is injected with a tranquilizer, then this 300 experience is worth the cat will immediately Attack the mouse with 250 experience points, because the cat is slapping like this because it's scared. This is also understandable why drivers tend to lose control of their tempers. They can yell and make insulting gestures in the car when the traffic is not smooth. In fact, this is because people feel safe and fearless in the car, regardless of the situation. How, at least I have a car to protect me, will not face the crisis.

title: Bitcoin price holds $23.5K, leading bulls to say â€˜itâ€™s different this timeâ€™
body:
Similar to Stockholm syndrome where captives develop a psychological bond with their captors, [crypto winters](https://cointelegraph.com/trading-for-beginners/bull-vs-bear-crypto-market-what-is-the-difference-and-how-to-handle-both) have a way of flipping even the most bullish cryptocurrency supporters bearish in a short period of time.

Evidence of this reality was on full display on July 19 after the recovery of Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) back above $23,000 was met with widespread warnings that the move was merely a fakeout before the market heads for new lows

While the possibility of new lows being set in the future canâ€™t be ruled out, hereâ€™s a look at analysts' opinions on how this BTC breakout could be different than most investors expect.

## This time "it's different"

The pointed message of â€œthis time is differentâ€ was offered by pseudonymous Twitter user Trader XM, who [posted](https://twitter.com/TraderXM1/status/1549194054226874377) the following chart outlining why BTC is poised to head higher.

*BTC/USD 4-hour chart. Source: Twitter*

As highlighted on the chart above, BTC price did not retest of the range low even as four retests of the range high took place, and this suggests that buyers are now stronger than sellers.

In response to the post from Trader XM, Twitter user Justiinape replied â€œ$27K-$28K seems imminent.â€

Trader XM [said](https://twitter.com/TraderXM1/status/1549195594392027139),

> â€œAgree my man, move to $27-28K then months of consolidation. Let's enjoy this move before the long hibernation.â€

## The next major resistance is at $27,100

Further evidence that BTC could head higher was supplied by the on-chain data firm Whalemap, which [posted](https://twitter.com/whale_map/status/1549450291552075778) the following chart highlighting the lack of buying demand between $23,000 and $27,000.

*Bitcoin volume profile. Source: Twitter*

Whalemap said,

> â€œ$27,100 should be the first resistance on our way up. Big gap in supply between current prices and $27K.â€

***Related: [Bitcoin price moves toward $24K and traders expect further upside, after a support retest](https://cointelegraph.com/news/bitcoin-price-moves-toward-24k-and-traders-expect-further-upside-after-a-support-retest)***

## Shorts get REKT

Proof that crypto traders had been lulled into an overly bearish outlook was provided by cryptocurrency analyst Dylan LeClair, who [posted](https://twitter.com/DylanLeClair_/status/1549476383226839040) the following chart showing the effect that Bitcoinâ€™s move above $23,000 had on the [futures traders](https://cointelegraph.com/trading-for-beginners/crypto-derivatives-101-a-beginners-guide-on-crypto-futures-crypto-options-and-perpetual-contracts).

*BTC/USD 2-hour chart. Source: Twitter*

As highlighted on the chart, there was a large amount of Bitcoin short positions opened between June 15 and July 15 and these traders now find themselves on the losing side of the trade.

LeClair said,

> â€œTens of thousands worth of BTC short open interest currently underwater.â€

While Bitcoin reversing course and heading lower once again remains a possibility, the current momentum suggests further upside in the short term.

The overall cryptocurrency market cap now stands at $1.055 trillion and Bitcoinâ€™s dominance rate is 42.1%.

title: Skybridge announces suspension of withdrawals from one of its crypto-exposed funds
body:
Skybridge Capital has suspended withdrawals from its Legion Strategies fund â€“ one of the firmâ€™s funds with crypto exposure. Founder Anthony Scaramucci confirmed the move July 19 in an interview on CNBC, after Bloomberg reported it a day earlier citing anonymous sources.Â 

â€œOur board made the decision to temporarily suspend until we can raise capital inside the fund,â€ Scaramucci told CNBC. â€œThe fund is unlevered, so thereâ€™s definitely no fear of any liquidation whatsoever and about 18% of the fund is in what we would call crypto exposure.â€ An independent board also took art in the decision, Scaramucci said.

Scaramucci mentioned Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) and FTX stock as examples of the fundâ€™s crypto exposure. Among other crypto-related companies listed as investments on the Skybridge website, not specifically linked to Legion Strategies, are Kraken, NYDIG, Helium, Lightning and Genesis Digital Assets. Scaramucci said the Legion Strategies fund was down 30% year-to-date, but up 5% in July.

Legion Strategies is an offshore fund based in the Cayman Islands that has about $250 million in it, according to Scaramucci. It is one of the smaller funds run by the company. This was the first time the fund had been suspended since its founding in 1994. Skybridge itself was founded in 2005.

Scaramucci told CNBC:

> â€œEverybody signed an investor agreement, this type of flexibility, so I donâ€™t think there are any surprises here given whatâ€™s going on in the overall market.â€

Skybridge is among the financial services companies that have [applied to list a Bitcoin exchange-traded fund](https://cointelegraph.com/news/sec-rejects-skybridge-s-application-for-spot-bitcoin-etf)and been rejected by the United Sates Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

***Related: [Scaramucci sees bright future for crypto but â€˜very worriedâ€™ about US politicians](https://cointelegraph.com/news/scaramucci-sees-bright-future-for-crypto-but-very-worried-about-us-politicians)***

Skybridge made its first investments in Bitcoin in late 2020 and announced in April that [it was repositioning itself](https://cointelegraph.com/news/skybridge-goes-all-in-on-crypto-betting-on-tremendous-growth-ahead) to â€œeventually be a leading cryptocurrency asset manager and adviser.â€

title: Bian Que's Heart Transmitter
body:
When Gonghu of Lu and Qi Ying of Zhao fell ill, they went to see the genius doctor Bian Que for diagnosis and treatment. Under Bian Que's meticulous care, their illnesses recovered in no time. However, Bian Que said to Gong Hu and Qi Ying, "The diseases you both sought to treat in the past were caused by the intrusion of pathogens from outside the body into the internal organs, so only medicine and acupuncture can solve the problem. God, I found out that there is still a disease lurking in you. It was brought out of your mother's womb and grew along with your body's development. This disease is very dangerous. I would like to treat you again, how about it?"
Gong Hu and Qi Ying replied, "We want to hear about the symptoms of this disease, and then make a decision."

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/22Axqee-imUpjpraoVcpN.png?height=270&width=232)


Therefore, Bian Que first said to Gong Hu: "You have lofty ambitions, and you are good at thinking about problems. You can have many ways to deal with problems, but unfortunately, your temperament is relatively weak, and you are often indecisive, hesitant, and lost at critical moments. Good opportunity." Then, he turned to Qi Ying: "What about you? It's the exact opposite of Gong Hu. You lack long-term plans for the future, your thoughts are relatively simple, but your temperament is very strong, and you don't think much about others, but you like to act arbitrarily. Finally, Bian Que said to the two of them: "Now if I exchange your hearts, you will all be perfect."
After listening to Bian Que's analysis, Gong Hu and Qi Ying were both willing to undergo a heart transplant. So, Bian Que made them both drink a kind of narcotic wine, causing them to fall into a coma and not wake up for three days. During this time, Bian Que opened their chests, took out their hearts, and exchanged them. After the operation, the magic medicine was applied to the wound, and when they recovered, they were still as healthy and strong as before the operation. After they said goodbye to Bian Que together, they went home separately.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/7Ei0IzueyAUdja31wQY50.png?height=276&width=330)


However, because the hearts have been exchanged, Gong Hu returned to Qi Ying's house, and Qi Ying returned to Gong Hu's house. The wives and children of the two families did not know the people who came home, so they all quarreled. Gong Hu and Qi Ying couldn't think of it, so they had to ask Bian Que to explain. Bian Que told the two families the whole story, so that the quarrel could be put to rest.
This fable is borrowing the name of the genius doctor Bian Que, using the metaphor of heart-changing, to show that everyone has their own strengths and weaknesses. As long as a person is good at taking others' strengths and making up for his own weaknesses, he will gradually become perfect.

title: Skybridge announces suspension of withdrawals from one of its crypto-exposed funds
body:
Skybridge Capital has suspended withdrawals from its Legion Strategies fund â€“ one of the firmâ€™s funds with crypto exposure. Founder Anthony Scaramucci confirmed the move July 19 in an interview on CNBC, after Bloomberg reported it a day earlier citing anonymous sources.Â 

â€œOur board made the decision to temporarily suspend until we can raise capital inside the fund,â€ Scaramucci told CNBC. â€œThe fund is unlevered, so thereâ€™s definitely no fear of any liquidation whatsoever and about 18% of the fund is in what we would call crypto exposure.â€ An independent board also took art in the decision, Scaramucci said.

Scaramucci mentioned Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) and FTX stock as examples of the fundâ€™s crypto exposure. Among other crypto-related companies listed as investments on the Skybridge website, not specifically linked to Legion Strategies, are Kraken, NYDIG, Helium, Lightning and Genesis Digital Assets. Scaramucci said the Legion Strategies fund was down 30% year-to-date, but up 5% in July.

Legion Strategies is an offshore fund based in the Cayman Islands that has about $250 million in it, according to Scaramucci. It is one of the smaller funds run by the company. This was the first time the fund had been suspended since its founding in 1994. Skybridge itself was founded in 2005.

Scaramucci told CNBC:

> â€œEverybody signed an investor agreement, this type of flexibility, so I donâ€™t think there are any surprises here given whatâ€™s going on in the overall market.â€

Skybridge is among the financial services companies that have [applied to list a Bitcoin exchange-traded fund](https://cointelegraph.com/news/sec-rejects-skybridge-s-application-for-spot-bitcoin-etf)and been rejected by the United Sates Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

***Related: [Scaramucci sees bright future for crypto but â€˜very worriedâ€™ about US politicians](https://cointelegraph.com/news/scaramucci-sees-bright-future-for-crypto-but-very-worried-about-us-politicians)***

Skybridge made its first investments in Bitcoin in late 2020 and announced in April that [it was repositioning itself](https://cointelegraph.com/news/skybridge-goes-all-in-on-crypto-betting-on-tremendous-growth-ahead) to â€œeventually be a leading cryptocurrency asset manager and adviser.â€

title: Bitcoin price holds $23.5K, leading bulls to say â€˜itâ€™s different this timeâ€™
body:
Similar to Stockholm syndrome where captives develop a psychological bond with their captors, [crypto winters](https://cointelegraph.com/trading-for-beginners/bull-vs-bear-crypto-market-what-is-the-difference-and-how-to-handle-both) have a way of flipping even the most bullish cryptocurrency supporters bearish in a short period of time.

Evidence of this reality was on full display on July 19 after the recovery of Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) back above $23,000 was met with widespread warnings that the move was merely a fakeout before the market heads for new lows

While the possibility of new lows being set in the future canâ€™t be ruled out, hereâ€™s a look at analysts' opinions on how this BTC breakout could be different than most investors expect.

## This time "it's different"

The pointed message of â€œthis time is differentâ€ was offered by pseudonymous Twitter user Trader XM, who [posted](https://twitter.com/TraderXM1/status/1549194054226874377) the following chart outlining why BTC is poised to head higher.

*BTC/USD 4-hour chart. Source: Twitter*

As highlighted on the chart above, BTC price did not retest of the range low even as four retests of the range high took place, and this suggests that buyers are now stronger than sellers.

In response to the post from Trader XM, Twitter user Justiinape replied â€œ$27K-$28K seems imminent.â€

Trader XM [said](https://twitter.com/TraderXM1/status/1549195594392027139),

> â€œAgree my man, move to $27-28K then months of consolidation. Let's enjoy this move before the long hibernation.â€

## The next major resistance is at $27,100

Further evidence that BTC could head higher was supplied by the on-chain data firm Whalemap, which [posted](https://twitter.com/whale_map/status/1549450291552075778) the following chart highlighting the lack of buying demand between $23,000 and $27,000.

*Bitcoin volume profile. Source: Twitter*

Whalemap said,

> â€œ$27,100 should be the first resistance on our way up. Big gap in supply between current prices and $27K.â€

***Related: [Bitcoin price moves toward $24K and traders expect further upside, after a support retest](https://cointelegraph.com/news/bitcoin-price-moves-toward-24k-and-traders-expect-further-upside-after-a-support-retest)***

## Shorts get REKT

Proof that crypto traders had been lulled into an overly bearish outlook was provided by cryptocurrency analyst Dylan LeClair, who [posted](https://twitter.com/DylanLeClair_/status/1549476383226839040) the following chart showing the effect that Bitcoinâ€™s move above $23,000 had on the [futures traders](https://cointelegraph.com/trading-for-beginners/crypto-derivatives-101-a-beginners-guide-on-crypto-futures-crypto-options-and-perpetual-contracts).

*BTC/USD 2-hour chart. Source: Twitter*

As highlighted on the chart, there was a large amount of Bitcoin short positions opened between June 15 and July 15 and these traders now find themselves on the losing side of the trade.

LeClair said,

> â€œTens of thousands worth of BTC short open interest currently underwater.â€

While Bitcoin reversing course and heading lower once again remains a possibility, the current momentum suggests further upside in the short term.

The overall cryptocurrency market cap now stands at $1.055 trillion and Bitcoinâ€™s dominance rate is 42.1%.

title: Amazon.eth ENS domain owner disregards 1M USDC buyout offer on Opensea
body:
On Tuesday, the Ethereum Name Service, or ENS, domain Amazon.eth [received](https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0x57f1887a8bf19b14fc0df6fd9b2acc9af147ea85/82229159103786399531023855469490700492269083837522026478948273323969890387800) an offerÂ for 1 million USDC (a stablecoin pegged to the U.S. dollar) from an anonymous wallet address on OpenSea. The offer to buy the ENS domain went unanswered however, and no transaction took place. This is despite the last sale of the domain name being five months ago for 33 Ether (worth around $100,000 at that time).

*The expired million-dollar offer for Amazon.eth on OpenSea* | *Source: OpenSea*

It is unclear at the time of publication whether the owner simply was not informed of the offer, or did not consider it to be near fair value, or if the bidding and domain owner accounts were linked in an attempt to boost the price of the asset (in what is known as a "wash trade"). According to data from Opense, other bid offers for the ENS domain stand at just around $6,200 USDC. The domain name is verified as official by ENS and is owned by anonymous OpenSea user 4761BF.

*The expired million-dollar offer for Amazon.eth on OpenSea* | *Source: OpenSea*

ENS is a blockchain naming protocol that allows users to store avatars and profile images for use across devices and send or receive crypto and nonfungible tokens. To sell a .eth domain on OpenSea, users would first need to connect their wallet and register an address at manager.ens.domains then list it on their OpenSea account.

While many crypto enthusiasts took up interesting or creative names for the ENS service, others have embarked on the practice of domain-flipping. That is, registering ENS domains containing names of prominent entities beforehand and then later demanding a high price for the domain should the said entity wishes to enter the Web 3.0 space later on.

Since its inception in 2017, there have been over 1.67 million .eth domain registrations across approximately 482,000 owners. More than 154,100 registrations were made recentl between July 5 to July 18, partly due to [lower gas fees](https://cointelegraph.com/news/ethereum-name-service-registrations-surge-by-200-amid-lower-gas-fees) and continued interest from entities seeking to enter the Web 3.0 space. To date, the ENS collection on OpenSea has witnessed approximately 46,200 ETH ($71.5 million) in cumulative transaction volume.Â

title: One tree becomes wood, ten trees become firewood
body:
In the early 1890s, in Houston, the southern United States, the cotton billionaire William Marshall Rice donated money to establish Rice University, which is one of the earliest private schools in the United States.

When the campus was built, Rice stipulated that not a single oak tree on the original site should be moved, and it should be carefully fortified. From the construction of the school to the completion of the school, there are no less oak trees, a total of 689 trees.

As a result, the school recruited 689 students in the first year.

People don't understand. Some people say that Rice has a problem with nerves, because according to the size of the school, it can recruit at least 1,000 students. Private schools, on the other hand, are supported by tuition fees, and there is no difference between a teacher teaching 50 students and 100 students.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/9ixZCSeEK4PkrlzE7hSZ0.png?height=270&width=367)

Rice continued to ask teachers and students to cultivate oak trees and new oak trees in sections until the campus was "saturated". If oak trees are in the way of infrastructure land, oak trees must be transplanted to another part of the campus at any cost, and they must be guaranteed to survive, or enrollment must be reduced accordingly the following year.

If the enrollment plan for the next year increases, the first thing the school has to do is to plant a corresponding number of oak trees. If unfortunately some do not survive, a corresponding number of students will be unlucky.

At this time, some people seem to have realized something, while more people are more puzzled, and some people even say that Rice may be an "oak spirit".

By 1902, the campus was finally "saturated" with 4,890 oak trees. At this time, Rice, who was seriously ill, made a rule: no matter when, the number of students in the school should not exceed 4,890.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YaSY-tY4jLnOHKz3fw0xD.png?height=270&width=405)

After his death, people saw that Rice University became famous and became "Harvard in the South of the United States", and people erected a statue for him, "the supreme pioneer of American private schools".

Until 2008, there were 4,890 lush oak trees on the 325-hectare campus, and the total number of students in the school was 4,850, slightly less than the total number of oaks. In public schools, the 325-hectare campus has at least 9,000 students.

More than 100 years later, no matter how the times change, no matter how the economy develops, the number of students at Rice University is always less than the number of oak trees. There has been no question or objection to Mr Rice's rule.

In fact, the reason is very simple. Of course, the results of growing one tree in one square meter and growing 10 trees in one square meter are different: one tree becomes wood, and 10 trees become firewood. Regarding the possibility of personalized education for teachers on stage, the teaching effect of a classroom with 20 students and 50 students is of course different.

It's a simple truth, but there are always too many people who can't imitate it - the truth is also very simple: it is caused by the desire for profit.

Rice University only restricts the number of students. For world-class experts and scholars who are interested in teaching, it not only refuses to come, but also takes the initiative to throw "hydrangea" to them. The total number of students is less than 5,000, but the total number of teachers exceeds 500, and the teacher-to-student ratio is greater than 1:10.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qV0muijlmghrsjc_6aDcH.png?height=270&width=289)

In the 2007 U.S. university rankings, from the 1st to the 21st place are all private universities, and only from the 22nd place are public universities. At No. 22 is the public University of California, Berkeley, which is also far from No. 21 in strength.

According to the 2010 National University Rankings, Rice University ranked 17th. It is a public university with its close proximity to the University of Texas, but it cannot be compared with Rice University in terms of academic level.

There are many unchangeable laws in nature.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GUBssrs47m64OD9vU5Bta.png?height=270&width=342)

On the same piece of land, the oak trees that can thrive are limited, and the number of students a university can accommodate is also limited, breaking the harmony between students, teachers and school-running conditions, the decline of teaching quality and the decline of school reputation will inevitably, eventually It affects the long-term development of the school. In fact, Rice University takes the oak tree as its teacher and follows the objective laws of nature, and longevity is inevitable.

title: US Justice Department seized $500K in fiat and crypto from hackers connected to DPRK government
body:
The United States Department of Justice has seized and returned roughly $500,000 in fiat and crypto from a hacking group tied to the North Korean government, which included two crypto payments made by U.S. health care providers.

In a Tuesday announcement, the Justice Department [said](https://www.justice.gov/opa/pr/justice-department-seizes-and-forfeits-approximately-500000-north-korean-ransomware-actors) in conjunction with the FBI it had investigated a $100,000 ransomware payment in Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) from a Kansas hospital to a North Korean hacking group in order to regain access to its systems, as well as a $120,000 BTC payment from a medical provider in Colorado to one of the wallets connected to the aforementioned attack. In May, the FBI filed a seizure warrant for funds from the two ransom attacks and others laundered through China, which the Justice Department reported as worth roughly $500,000 total.

â€œThese sophisticated criminals are constantly pushing boundaries to search for ways to extort money from victims by forcing them to pay ramsons in order to regain control of their computer and record systems,â€ said Duston Slinkar, U.S. Attorney for the District of Kansas. â€œWhat these hackers donâ€™t count on is the tenacity of the U.S. Justice Department in recovering and returning these funds to the rightful owners.â€

U.S. Deputy Attorney General Lisa Monaco [said](https://www.justice.gov/opa/speech/deputy-attorney-general-lisa-o-monaco-delivers-keynote-address-international-conference) in a speech for the International Conference on Cyber Security on Tuesday that authorities relied on victims from the private sector to report ransomware attacks and others â€œas soon as those crimes occurâ€:

> â€œIf you report that attack, if you report the ransom demand and payment, if you work with the FBI, we can take action; we can follow the money and get it back; we can help prevent the next attack, the next victim; and we can hold cybercriminals accountable. Those companies that work with us will see that we stand with them in the aftermath of an incident.â€

According to Monaco, the FBI and Justice Department traced the ransom payments [through the blockchain](https://cointelegraph.com/blockchain-for-beginners) in much the same way they [found and seized more than $2 million in crypto](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-officials-recover-2-3m-in-crypto-from-colonial-pipeline-ransom) following an attack on the Colonial Pipeline system in 2021. The Office of the Attorney General lateÂ [announced the formation](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-justice-dept-announces-launch-of-national-crypto-enforcement-team) of a National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team under the Justice Department, and a Virtual Asset Exploitation Unit under the FBI. Both teams were aimed at addressing cybercrimes used for â€œdigital extortionâ€ of funds, including crypto.

***Related: [US federal judge approves of Justice Dept criminal complaint on using crypto to evade sanctions](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-federal-judge-approves-of-justice-dept-criminal-complaint-on-using-crypto-to-evade-sanctions)***

Hacking groups connected to either North Korea and Russia have reportedly been responsible for many major ransomware and cyber attacks in the United States and globally. In April, the Treasury Departmentâ€™s Office of Foreign Assets Control [named North Korean cyber-criminal Lazarus Group](https://cointelegraph.com/news/north-korean-lazarus-group-allegedly-behind-ronin-bridge-hack) as the entity behind a March 2022 hack of Ronin Bridge, in which more than $600 million in crypto assets were removed.

title: a happy direction in life
body:
There is a young man who always has a hard life. He has a stable job, but also has his parents who love him. He does not worry about food, clothing, or lack of love. However, he always felt that he had endless troubles, entangled in his heart, unable to break free or escape.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/k__liI4CFCrXxRi4cKhrI.png?height=270&width=376)

How can people be so troubled? Young people are confused. One day, when he met a wise man, he expressed the confusion in his heart, hoping to get enlightenment.

After listening to the wise man, he smiled slightly and said, "The secular world, the wine pond and the meat forest, the human dance in the red dust, the famous locks and the locks, everything is tempting and confusing people. If you want to move, you will be excited, and you will naturally be troubled. Gains and losses, glory and shame, ups and downs... The more you care, the more painful your heart will be; on the contrary, the more you give up, the more peaceful your heart will be. "Let go" is to eliminate the root cause of troubles.

The young man nodded, if he understood something.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BQEGTouCkjVSpp5KsQMFZ.png?height=286&width=460)

Another day, he met a philanthropist. It is said that the philanthropist once made a lot of money, but then donated the money to others. Now, he lives happily.

The young man told the philanthropist his confusion again, hoping to get an answer from him.

The philanthropist said, I have had the same pain as you. However, since I learned to pay attention to others and to love others, the pain in my heart disappeared. Love is really an oar given to us by God, it can ferry us beyond the sea of â€‹â€‹misery.

A selfish person will not get great pleasures in life. Only those who have love in their hearts can create ripples of infinite happiness in the echo of love. Sharing the pain of others can also relieve your own pain; showing your own warmth will also receive the warm gift of others. This is the magical power of love.

Yes, troubles, more often, are the result of selfishness. When a person has others in his heart and loves others, troubles will be lessened.

The words of a philanthropist make young people feel like they can see the sun through the clouds.

Once again, the unit organized a trip, and the young man saw an old woman pounding rice in a farm household. While pounding rice, she hummed a folk song. Looks very happy.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/StyiONxVh7g7jmObGno-W.png?height=270&width=390)

He also shared his confusion to the old woman, hoping to get a different answer from her.

trouble? The old woman frowned and looked at the young man and said, "I have been working from morning to night. I have been busy all my life. As long as I am working, I am singing and I am happy. I don't have time to worry.

The old woman paused and said to herself, maybe, only people who are free will be troubled.

Thinking of the words of wise men and philanthropists in the past, at that moment, young people suddenly became enlightened: It turned out that this world, unable to let go, no love in the heart, and boredom, will all be the source of troubles, and no matter what it is, it will become a spiritual source. The quagmire makes a person miserable.

When the young man understands this, it is natural that he also finds a happy direction in life.

title: #Winning
body:
This week I had planned to write on the topic of doxing, or more specifically, about the question of â€œto dox or not to doxâ€, and the choice for, or against, web3 anonymity. As inspired as I initially felt to explore it, once I sat down to outline it the work began to feel like a grind. Then, as I often do these days when feeling stuck, I turned my attention to twitter for a daily download of crypto news and DAOist musings. Somewhere in my feed, from someone I had never heard of, there appeared the following,

â€œYou are the average of the 5 people you spend the most time with.
Thatâ€™s why every quarter, I evaluate myself and my friends on 3 key criteria:

* Income
* Fitness
* Influence

Anyone who scores below me is cut off.
Complacency is the first step towards mediocrity.â€

A day later, though I donâ€™t recall all the details of my reaction, I think it a safe bet it included some combination of a furrowed brow, my best [gas face](https://slangdefine.org/g/gas-face-13ec.html) and nausea.  All of that before I fired back with the first thing to come to mind as a counter blow.

â€œCongratulations on a life devoid of either giving or receiving unconditional love. Youâ€™re winning though. ğŸ‘Šâ€

[https://twitter.com/HAshBrown_27/status/1548437771974348801?s=20&t=4QqD9qeeewCOpN7zYUJ16g](https://twitter.com/HAshBrown_27/status/1548437771974348801?s=20&t=4QqD9qeeewCOpN7zYUJ16g)

Soon after that I turned off my computer and went out for the day. Honestly, I donâ€™t think it occurred to me that I would even look at the tweet again. To the contrary, as someone new to twitter this year, I expected my response would go largely ignored, joining my 20-or-so other tweets in the land of twitter oblivion. To my surprise though, when I returned home several hours later, I noticed my twitter notification bell ringing, alerting me to the fact that my response had close to 200 likes. 20 hours later that number is now up to 488. Not that Iâ€™m counting.

Iâ€™m new to this twitter thing, and as far as â€œlikesâ€ are concerned, have only facebook likes of posts of my kids, mountain views and fishing pictures to compare it to. 488 likes seems like a lot though. So while it may be small potatoes to seasoned tweeters with big followings, Iâ€™m a babe in the woods here, feeling pretty proud of that 488 thank you very much. Ooh, lookie there, just shot past 500. Am I going viral? LFG!!!

Seriously though, upon looking into the phenomena of my most-liked social media entry ever, I see the person I responded to has a lot of followers. 6,075 to be exact. And digging a little deeper I realize he likely intended his tweet as satire. Gas face rescinded. Perhaps the joke is on me for responding to it.

Satire or not, and irrespective of whether his friendship circles have anything to do with crypto and Web3, [@_mihir](https://twitter.com/__mihir?s=20&t=iOpvhasWZtEkPYiiXfkDYw) points to something very concerning to me about Web3 culture and the playing field of web3 identity. Playas gonna play. So how will Web3 define winning?

Before we get into all that I sense some context would be helpful.  A man in my early 50â€™s, I am at most a social media dabbler. I have a facebook page that I post on occasionally and to keep up with the lives of my 926 friends. I have created a few blogs over the years that I have enjoyed writing on but never broadcasted. Instagram? Ohhh hellll noâ€¦.except to check in on the lives of my college-age children. I regard the notion of creating a web â€œidentityâ€ as near hostile to my bias for real-life interaction with others and time outdoors. And other than a short list of physical ailments, I canâ€™t think of anything Iâ€™d like less than â€œfollowersâ€.

So what am I doing here worrying and writing about Web3 culture?  Fair question. What can I say except [orange pills](https://ryanslot.substack.com/p/what-it-means-to-be-orange-pilled#details) are a thing. [Green pills](https://www.forbes.com/sites/kylewestaway/2022/06/16/how-crypto-can-regenerate-the-world/?sh=7ed83b602fd3) too. Iâ€™ve fallen down a [crypto rabbit hole](https://garywoodfine.com/going-down-the-crypto-rabbit-hole/) and I canâ€™t get up!

The truth is that while I wrestle with mixed emotions about getting involved, I am thankful for cryptoâ€™s role in opening my mind (ğŸ¤¯) and luring me beyond my comfort zone.  For every horror story of greed, theft and exploitation related to this new frontier, I find most of what I read about the space to be inspiring.  To quote the immortal words of Buffalo Springfield, [â€œSomethings Happening Hereâ€](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rQUj56sqicU), 2020â€™s style, and most days I want to be a part of it.

One example of this is an article, [â€œThe Future of Workâ€](https://newsletter.banklesshq.com/p/the-future-of-work), by David Hoffman. David makes a strong case for why Digital Organizations (DOâ€™s), enabled by the blockchain and tokenized incentives, will present unprecedented opportunities for humans to coordinate both our heartsâ€™ and mindsâ€™ shared interests to do purposeful work together.  Among the many lines to strike a chord with me David writes,

â€œIf you are a young person, looking for purpose, meaning, and eventually a salary, establishing yourself as a strong DOer is one of the best footholds you can establish for yourselfâ€¦.If you believe DOs are the future, you should start DOing now, so that you become the scarce resource for both DOs and people who need help DOing.â€

Relative to the audience David likely had in mind I am not a â€œyoung personâ€. That said, aside from a rather curmudgeonly attitude toward social media, I pride myself at being young in spirit. I am DOing (and DAOing) now and, in time, aspire to be among the scarce, most valued resources of the space. So what game am I playing? And what was it about @_mihirâ€s tweet that bothered me so?

Though it has been over 20 years since I worked as an equity analyst at an investment brokerage firm, that work, and my short time in the industry, taught me some valuable lessons. The most memorable of them is the difference between the â€œgameâ€ of judging companiesâ€™ worth on the basis of quarterly performance vs. that of valuing them (or not) on the basis of fundamental strengths relative to longer-term investment horizons. The former game is played to generate transactions that pay brokers and their firms. The latter is played to maximize investorsâ€™ returns.

Web3 playing fields, DOs and DAOs included, will create whole new worlds from which to relate to the earth, token projects, and one another. There will be more games to go around than anyone can count in the spaceâ€™s many arenas. Short-term trading, of crypto and people, can be fun, even profitable. Patient investment, in the people and projects that mean the most to us, can change the world. Web3 only wins by changing the world.

title: US Justice Department seized $500K in fiat and crypto from hackers connected to DPRK government
body:
The United States Department of Justice has seized and returned roughly $500,000 in fiat and crypto from a hacking group tied to the North Korean government, which included two crypto payments made by U.S. health care providers.

In a Tuesday announcement, the Justice Department [said](https://www.justice.gov/opa/pr/justice-department-seizes-and-forfeits-approximately-500000-north-korean-ransomware-actors) in conjunction with the FBI it had investigated a $100,000 ransomware payment in Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)) from a Kansas hospital to a North Korean hacking group in order to regain access to its systems, as well as a $120,000 BTC payment from a medical provider in Colorado to one of the wallets connected to the aforementioned attack. In May, the FBI filed a seizure warrant for funds from the two ransom attacks and others laundered through China, which the Justice Department reported as worth roughly $500,000 total.

â€œThese sophisticated criminals are constantly pushing boundaries to search for ways to extort money from victims by forcing them to pay ramsons in order to regain control of their computer and record systems,â€ said Duston Slinkar, U.S. Attorney for the District of Kansas. â€œWhat these hackers donâ€™t count on is the tenacity of the U.S. Justice Department in recovering and returning these funds to the rightful owners.â€

U.S. Deputy Attorney General Lisa Monaco [said](https://www.justice.gov/opa/speech/deputy-attorney-general-lisa-o-monaco-delivers-keynote-address-international-conference) in a speech for the International Conference on Cyber Security on Tuesday that authorities relied on victims from the private sector to report ransomware attacks and others â€œas soon as those crimes occurâ€:

> â€œIf you report that attack, if you report the ransom demand and payment, if you work with the FBI, we can take action; we can follow the money and get it back; we can help prevent the next attack, the next victim; and we can hold cybercriminals accountable. Those companies that work with us will see that we stand with them in the aftermath of an incident.â€

According to Monaco, the FBI and Justice Department traced the ransom payments [through the blockchain](https://cointelegraph.com/blockchain-for-beginners) in much the same way they [found and seized more than $2 million in crypto](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-officials-recover-2-3m-in-crypto-from-colonial-pipeline-ransom) following an attack on the Colonial Pipeline system in 2021. The Office of the Attorney General lateÂ [announced the formation](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-justice-dept-announces-launch-of-national-crypto-enforcement-team) of a National Cryptocurrency Enforcement Team under the Justice Department, and a Virtual Asset Exploitation Unit under the FBI. Both teams were aimed at addressing cybercrimes used for â€œdigital extortionâ€ of funds, including crypto.

***Related: [US federal judge approves of Justice Dept criminal complaint on using crypto to evade sanctions](https://cointelegraph.com/news/us-federal-judge-approves-of-justice-dept-criminal-complaint-on-using-crypto-to-evade-sanctions)***

Hacking groups connected to either North Korea and Russia have reportedly been responsible for many major ransomware and cyber attacks in the United States and globally. In April, the Treasury Departmentâ€™s Office of Foreign Assets Control [named North Korean cyber-criminal Lazarus Group](https://cointelegraph.com/news/north-korean-lazarus-group-allegedly-behind-ronin-bridge-hack) as the entity behind a March 2022 hack of Ronin Bridge, in which more than $600 million in crypto assets were removed.

title: CoinEx | How to Buy $CET: The Most Comprehensive Tutorial!
body:
What are the ways to buy CET? Today, we will introduce the specific steps of how to buy CET on CoinEx, a CEX, and **[OneSwap](https://www.oneswap.net/)**, a DEX. In addition to buying CET with cryptos like USDT and BTC, you can also directly convert other cryptos into CET!

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/71ItqUQQYIjAWderYnHRx.png?height=787&width=1400)

# Method 1: Buy CET via spot trading on CoinEx

1\. Firstly, weâ€™ll need to visit the **[CoinEx website](https://www.coinex.com/)** and log in to our account. Next, select \[Exchange\] in the navigation bar to enter the **spot trading** page.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0JDNtGVuhxbUNgmdQS-pf.png?height=761&width=1400)

2\. Here, we **buy CET with USDT** (order type: Limit).

(1) Firstly, enter CET in the search bar and select \[CET/USDT\] to go to the CET/USDT trading market.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PW8-lA-fgysDVUVGe1PZM.png?height=778&width=1400)

(2) Click on \[Spot Trading\], select \[Limit\] and \[Always Valid\] (default), enter the \[Price\] and \[Amount\], and click on \[Buy CET\] after confirmation to create an order (the order will be executed when the market price reaches the price we set).

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/sUuFUNa15rv88gInPtrKX.png?height=582&width=1202)

# Method 2. Buy CET through CoinEx Swap

1\. Click on \[Swap\] on the homepage to enter the **Swap** webpage.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ZQ6Jpyp1pC38HBPkqr7TX.png?height=724&width=1400)

2\. We can then select the target cryptos available in the drop-down lists on the Swap page. For instance, to swap USDT for CET, we should select USDT in the â€œFromâ€ drop-down list and CET in the â€œToâ€ drop-down list.

 
 

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/WtEANAGIQmQ_Wn9IvTnb9.png?height=795&width=1400)

3\. Enter the amount of CET to be swapped, and the platform will automatically calculate the amount of USDT required. Finally, click on \[Swap\].

# Method 3: Swap cryptos for CET on OneSwap

1\. Log in to our **[OneSwap](https://www.oneswap.net/)** account, select \[CET\] in the public chain drop-down list, and connect to our wallet.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lAlfBAEkBeaeV8mGcXxd2.png?height=646&width=1400)

2\. Select \[Swap\] in the navigation bar on the homepage or click the \[Swap\] button on the homepage to enter the swap webpage.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/w-P7LlNUQSnTkIs_IZHCu.png?height=636&width=1400)

3\. Select a token on the \[Swap\] page. Here, we select \[From USDT To CET\]. Then, we should enter the amount of CET to be swapped, and OneSwap will automatically calculate the amount of USDT required.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/VCVrW809erWT8gPY9c80N.png?height=1183&width=1400)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/MeTP602eVftXCIp3Rb99Q.png?height=747&width=1400)

4\. It should be noted that to avoid significant deviations due to the slippage, we could set a slippage tolerance figure below the swap bar and save it.

Pay trading fees with CET
After buying CET or swapping other cryptos for CET, users could then pay trading fees with CET on CoinEx through the following steps:

1. Go to the CoinEx website, click on \[Account\] at the upper right corner and then \[Preferences Settings\];
2. Slide the button to the right to activate \[Use CET as Fees\], and you will be able to use CET to pay trading fees for your next transaction.

Court documents that describe the insolvency of failed crypto hedge fund Three Arrows Capital, also known as 3AC, may be overestimating the value of the firmâ€™s remaining assets â€” specifically, its exposure to crypto options exchange Deribit.Â 

In aÂ [1,100-page affidavit composed by liquidator Russell Crumpler](https://cointelegraph.com/news/3ac-liquidators-seek-time-access-to-headquarters-as-genesis-algorand-ties-are-untangled) and filed in a British Virgin Islands court, 3AC was described as â€œinsolventâ€ and in need of being completely â€œwound upâ€ because "Its management cannot be trusted to retain any remaining assets for the benefit of creditors." The documents also detailed 3ACâ€™s remaining assets, which included shares of Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC), cryptocurrencies Bitcoin ([BTC](https://cointelegraph.com/bitcoin-price)), Avalanche ([AVAX](https://cointelegraph.com/avalanche-price-index)) and Near (NEAR), and shares of Deribit. Liquidators want access to these assets in order to facilitate creditorsâ€™ claims, which are [worth at least $2.8 billion](https://cointelegraph.com/news/3ac-allegedly-liable-for-2-8b-in-creditor-claims).

According to the affidavit, the Deribit shares are believed to be worth $500 million, or half of 3ACâ€™s remaining assets. However, a source with knowledge of the matter told Cointelegraph that the value of 3ACâ€™s Deribit shares is closer to $25 million rather than $500 million, suggesting that creditors will be left holding the bag on their loans to the failed hedge fund.

According to the source, who chose to remain anonymous, the discrepancy between the two amounts is due to the type of exposure 3AC has to Deribit. They claim that 3AC does not directly own shares in Deribit but instead owns shares in a Singapore Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV) called 3AC QCP Deribit SPV. The largest shareholders of the SPV are 3AC and QCP Soteria Node, a holding company whose portfolio includes Algorand and PundiX, according to its website. The SPVâ€™s directors include QCP Soteria Node founder Sherwin Lee, QCP Capital co-founder Darius Sit and [Three Arrows Capital co-founder Su Zhu](https://cointelegraph.com/news/su-zhu-s-cryptic-statement-as-rumors-swirl-of-3ac-liquidation-and-insolvency).

***Related: [Crypto Biz: 3ACâ€™s founders are nowhere to be found](https://cointelegraph.com/news/crypto-biz-3ac-s-founders-are-nowhere-to-be-found)***

The source further explained that the SPV owns over 23% of Deribit, making it the largest external shareholder. Of that total, 3AC owns 16%, making it the largest shareholder in the SPV.

â€œThe SPV shares are worth significantly less than direct Deribit shares due to several material encumbrances,â€ the source said, adding:

> â€œThe owner of the SPV shares cannot sell or transfer the underlying Deribit shares without unanimous consent \[...\] This means that the owner of the shares will be stuck with the SPV. These are entrenched in SPV constitution.â€

The source claimed that QCP Soteria Node also has certain contractual powers, including the right of first refusal and tag-along rights, on 3ACâ€™s SPV shares based on a side letter agreement between the two parties.

Over the course of several years, 3AC had been selling portions of its 16% stake through â€œbinding side letters to numerous parties who are now claiming that they have an ownership on the 3AC SPV shares,â€ they said. â€œThere are at least four known parties who have these side letters and have put in their claims to ownership of the 3AC shares in the SPV. Some of them are on the liquidator's official list of creditors.â€

***Related: [Liquidators can subpoena 3AC founders despite â€˜tricky issuesâ€™ with crypto assets](https://cointelegraph.com/news/liquidators-can-subpoena-3ac-founders-despite-tricky-issues-with-crypto-assets)***

The source claimed that a â€œsignificant discountâ€ would need to be placed on the value of their shares due to these underlying encumbrances:

> â€œA significant discount needs to be placed on the value of the 3AC SPV shares because any buyer of these shares would be subject to these encumbrances and would have significant difficulty monetizing the shares in the future and would also have to deal with the entire SPV which has close to 30 members.â€

Three Arrows Capital represents one of cryptoâ€™s most significant falls from grace. Once the most revered hedge fund in the industry, holding over $10 billion in assets under management, [3AC began to implode](https://cointelegraph.com/news/three-arrows-capital-has-failed-to-meet-margin-calls-report) in the wake of the Terra ecosystem collapse. Among its missteps was placing a series of large directional bets on GBTC, LUNA (now LUNC) and Lidoâ€™s Staked ETH during the worst macroeconomic backdrop since the 2008 financial crisis.Â 

*Cointelegraph attempted to reach out to Three Arrows Capital on the matter, but did not receive a response prior to publication.*

*AuthorÂ [Joseph Hall](https://cointelegraph.com/authors/joseph-hall)Â contributed to this story.*

title: Amazon.eth ENS domain owner disregards 1M USDC buyout offer on Opensea
body:
On Tuesday, the Ethereum Name Service, or ENS, domain Amazon.eth [received](https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0x57f1887a8bf19b14fc0df6fd9b2acc9af147ea85/82229159103786399531023855469490700492269083837522026478948273323969890387800) an offerÂ for 1 million USDC (a stablecoin pegged to the U.S. dollar) from an anonymous wallet address on OpenSea. The offer to buy the ENS domain went unanswered however, and no transaction took place. This is despite the last sale of the domain name being five months ago for 33 Ether (worth around $100,000 at that time).

*The expired million-dollar offer for Amazon.eth on OpenSea* | *Source: OpenSea*

It is unclear at the time of publication whether the owner simply was not informed of the offer, or did not consider it to be near fair value, or if the bidding and domain owner accounts were linked in an attempt to boost the price of the asset (in what is known as a "wash trade"). According to data from Opense, other bid offers for the ENS domain stand at just around $6,200 USDC. The domain name is verified as official by ENS and is owned by anonymous OpenSea user 4761BF.

*The expired million-dollar offer for Amazon.eth on OpenSea* | *Source: OpenSea*

ENS is a blockchain naming protocol that allows users to store avatars and profile images for use across devices and send or receive crypto and nonfungible tokens. To sell a .eth domain on OpenSea, users would first need to connect their wallet and register an address at manager.ens.domains then list it on their OpenSea account.

While many crypto enthusiasts took up interesting or creative names for the ENS service, others have embarked on the practice of domain-flipping. That is, registering ENS domains containing names of prominent entities beforehand and then later demanding a high price for the domain should the said entity wishes to enter the Web 3.0 space later on.

Since its inception in 2017, there have been over 1.67 million .eth domain registrations across approximately 482,000 owners. More than 154,100 registrations were made recentl between July 5 to July 18, partly due to [lower gas fees](https://cointelegraph.com/news/ethereum-name-service-registrations-surge-by-200-amid-lower-gas-fees) and continued interest from entities seeking to enter the Web 3.0 space. To date, the ENS collection on OpenSea has witnessed approximately 46,200 ETH ($71.5 million) in cumulative transaction volume.Â

title: clouds and winds are light
body:
![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IQck4Pbz0_dphwHj6n6Lj.png?height=266&width=430)

In my spare time, I always like to type on the keyboard in front of the computer, writing novels that others think are not novels. Even so, I still enjoy writing.

I especially enjoy writing when I'm feeling down. Because at that time, my sense of touch was the most sensitive, my thinking was also very active, and my thinking ability would also be enhanced. Even the editing and expression of words were far better than usual. I was able to get into the state of writing very well, I might even say it was a good state.

At that time, I could travel from this real life to another virtual world. There, I was like a god, a god who could overturn clouds and rain, and be omnipotent. I control the fate of all people, whether happy or sad, fortunate or unfortunate. I immersed myself in it and enjoyed it happily.

In this real life, I always like to observe every person around me in detail and everything that happens to them. When I am alone, I slowly crumble them, reshape them, and sneak them into my novels.

Whenever I see them dazed, confused, hesitant, helpless, tangled... irritable, my thoughts will become clearer and more organized.

I thought to myself, how would I be if he (she) was. After empathy, I will deal with it rationally in my novel, and then arrange various plots, scenes and later changes.

At that moment, I forgot my true self. Even in real life, I have the same troubles as the storyteller, but at that time, I put them all aside. At that time, all my attention and energy were placed on the people and events in the story.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hssrKiQ-nCpfDIzo61E6D.png?height=280&width=448)

A friend once talked to me about it, and he said, "This state is called obsession."

In fact, I don't know myself, is this state of obsession or an escape?

Perhaps, in this real life, I am a person who is melancholy and carries a lot of troubles. Entry to me is probably a way of getting out and getting away. Only in this way can I ignore the present moment and gain a temporary relief.

A friend said: "If this state is escapism, it is too narrow; if it is selflessness, it is very admirable; if it is obsession, then it is even more worthy of appreciation and praise."

Listening to his words, I laughed and teased him: "It is very likely that I am still transforming in these states. These should be the process of my evolution..."

After chatting with him, I suddenly came to a realization.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cLfJbFMeOI2OUSb2dNlsM.png?height=266&width=465)

Perhaps, many times, we can see ourselves as other people, both inside and outside the story. In the face of all the complicated and tricky things, we might as well step aside and be a quiet bystander emotionally and seriously, just like watching a movie or TV show. Finally, we combine objective vision, use rational thinking and the most effective way to solve problems.

Then I think that when we have such thoughts, mentality and ability, we should be able to calmly face all the difficulties and various tests in life at any time.

Therefore, the four words "clouds and winds are light", it no longer belongs to some people, we can also have it.

title: wind outside the window
body:
Spring has come quietly, not too late, not too late. It came to me when the spring breeze blew through the window...

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/65GgsYJu35m6aLS-Ghmzm.png?height=270&width=405)

I was looking at the book by the window, the wind outside the window blew through the curtains and kissed my cheek, and naughty flipped the book in my hand. I only heard the sound of rushing, the book in my hand was turned a few pages, and the wind coming in from the window seemed to come in and tell me it was time to wake up. "Because a day's plan is in the morning, and a year's plan is in the spring." Spring is the season for sowing, and only hard work can bring harvest in autumn. Yeah, isn't my hard work today just to be rewarded in the fall?

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Yi8VKc24ysugFLMJtKX5X.png?height=270&width=390)

At this time, the wind outside the window is not so soft, so light. It is not like the cold wind in winter, and it is not soft and quiet like the breeze in summer, but it is gentle in the rush, and strong in the soft.

In the early morning, the wind outside the window is like a quiet Jiangnan woman, always stroking the bamboo leaves outside the window gently and carefully. Under the sunshine of the morning sun, the bamboo leaves outside the window swayed gracefully under the accompaniment of pure music, carefully making a thin sound. Scattered shadows are reflected on the glass of the window, swaying gently in the soft sunlight. The wind outside the window blows so gently and quietly...

But slowly... the sun rose over the top of the mountain, the sun blew across the top of the mountain, and the wind outside the window was no longer so quiet, only the bamboo leaves outside the window rustled, and the bamboo leaves kept rustling in the wind. At noon, when the sun rises to the sky, the wind outside the window blows into the window and brings a stream of heat. It is not as boring as the heat in autumn. It is cool and warm, which makes people feel particularly warm. Very comfortable. The wind outside the window at noon is no longer pure music, but a simple piece of music. It immediately entered the window and woke me up, who was about to fall asleep. Listening to the rustling sound, I woke up a lot...

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Za4UdjGyz0CCdPTP0Wdne.png?height=270&width=390)

When it was almost dusk in the afternoon, the sun was about to set on the top of the mountain, and the afterglow of the sun shone on the bamboo forest outside the window. The sun is no longer so strong and harsh, but only a soft light is left. When I raised my head, I could look directly at the sun on the top of the mountain, instead of being unable to open my eyes in the sun like noon. By this time, the wind outside the window had not stopped since the early morning, but was more rapid, as if to catch up with the pace of the sun, so rapid that it could not stop for a moment. I could only hear the wind blowing the bamboo leaves and making a whistling sound. Not only the bamboo leaves were swaying, but the whole bamboo forest was shaking constantly. The whistling wind was accompanied by the rustling of bamboo leaves. The wind outside the window was so strong and powerful that it was desperately playing a majestic symphony. At this time, the wind outside the window was no longer so quiet, and the curtains were also jumping randomly, so I quickly got up and closed the window...

When night fell, it was pitch black outside the window, and the dark night was only accompanied by stars. At this time, the wind outside the window has quieted down, it did not go, but just stayed quietly in the bamboo forest outside the window. But I clearly felt its presence, and it quietly entered the window. Touching my face under the light, I felt a chill, and I immediately recovered from being in a daze. And the bamboo forest under the light outside the window did not continue to play music, they were whispering in rustling, and slowly became quiet...

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JGfN2VTnnVyZwy3aMImL1.png?height=266&width=456)

In the dead of night, I also slowly fell asleep under the caress of the wind outside the window. In my dream, there is a bamboo forest outside the window and the wind outside the window. I sit in front of the window, open the window, and quietly look at the bamboo forest outside the window. In fact, the bamboo forest outside the window is not alone, because Fenger has been accompanying them...
